channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Oral GLP-1 Pill For Weight Loss Shows Promise, But Challenges Remain
item.description: Experts see a place for pill formulations of GLP-1s as treatment for patients to switch to after reaching a target weight or blood sugar level on inje...

item.title: Bridging The Infrastructure Funding Gap: Innovative Solutions For Cities
item.description: Federal grants aren’t enough. Discover innovative ways cities fund transportation—curb pricing, partnerships, local taxes & climate-focused financing.

item.title: Curiosity Is Valuable In The Age Of AI
item.description: Curiosity drives innovation and helps us harness AI thoughtfully, asking better questions to shape learning, work, and future progress.

item.title: Upcoming New ‘Throne And Liberty’ Housing System Looks Fantastic
item.description: Amazon Games and NCSOFT detailed the upcoming new housing system for Throne and Liberty in a recently published Q&A blog post.

item.title: GPS Is Old And Hackable. DARPA Is Working Quantum Navigation To Replace It
item.description: Recently, GPS jamming endangered a world leader's airplane. Could quantum navigation be the solution to replace GPS? DARPA is funding multiple project...

item.title: Bringing goodwill to the conversation
item.description: Education is distinct from learning. Organized education is a form of indoctrination and certification. Sometimes it leads to learning, but not always...

item.title: Walk away or dance

item.title: Possibility vs. certainty
